prezi-desc: Brief description about what the extension does; shown on [[Special:Version]] when the extension is installed
prezi-link:
Parameters:



* $1 is the Prezi presentation identifier (ID)

* $2 is either the user-supplied link text, or if the user didn't supply a custom link title, then it falls back to [[MediaWiki:Prezi-presentation]]
prezi-presentation: Default link title for the presentation link ([[MediaWiki:Prezi-link]]) if the user didn't supply a custom link title
